name: Echoes of the Sea

branding_data.short_description: Echoes of the Sea is a fish-themed bard's tale game where players explore the rhythms of the ocean, focusing on ethical fishing and sustainability through repetitive musical and storytelling elements.
branding_data.detailed_description: Echoes of the Sea is an innovative bard's tale adventure set in a vibrant, oceanic world. Players assume the role of a bard who journeys through various coastal and underwater environments, weaving tales that highlight the importance of ethical fishing practices and environmental sustainability. The game emphasizes repetition as a core mechanic, using musical loops and recurring narrative themes to immerse players in the cyclical nature of the ocean. Players compose songs, using both traditional instruments and natural sounds from marine life, to influence townsfolk and creatures, encouraging sustainable practices and unveiling hidden stories of the sea. By embracing and manipulating these repeating motifs, players unlock new interactions and solve environmental puzzles, learning the impact of their actions on the ecosystem.
